pkgmetadata.longdescription: Processing of the 'Planet NICFI' Satellite Imagery // It includes functions to download and process the 'Planet NICFI' (Norway's International Climate and Forest Initiative) Satellite Imagery utilizing the Planet Mosaics API https://developers.planet.com/ docs/basemaps/reference/#tag/Basemaps-and-Mosaics. 'GDAL' (library for raster and vector geospatial data formats) and 'aria2c' (paralleled download utility) must be installed and configured in the user's Operating System.
